attributes.action: withdraw all British Troops from Afghanistan and Iraq with immediate effect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The wars in Iraq and Afghanistan have been totally illegal and too many lives have been lost.Afghanistan can never be won.History has shown us that.We should now withdraw and concentrate on the issues that affect us and not concentrate on the affairs of other countries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
